description.plain:
Chloe x Halle are an American R&B duo, actresses, singers and YouTube sensations made up of sisters Chloe and Halle Bailey. They are signed to Beyoncé’s label Parkwood as well as Columbia Records.

Sister duo Chloe X Halle navigated YouTube’s pop landscape with a string of jaw-dropping covers the past couple of years revealing their gift for creating keening harmonies and genuine musical moments that showcase their expansive range. It was their soulful rendition of Beyoncé’s own “Pretty Hurts” that caught the attention of the mogul’s Parkwood Entertainment imprint in 2013.

The girl’s released their very first mixtape, The Two of Us, on March 16, 2017. The mixtape was released for free on their website then was released onto their youtube channel and Soundcloud later on.

Their debut album, The Kids Are Alright, was released on March 23, 2018, and peaked at number 139 on the Billboard 200. The album became the duo’s first entry on the chart. The album also gave the duo their first two grammy nominations for the 61st Grammy Awards.

Their second album, Ungodly Hour, was released on June 12, 2020, and peaked at number 16 on the Billboard 200. It became the duo’s highest charting album.
